doc_desc.title: Depression, Anxiety and Stress Scale-21 (DASS-21) - Psychological Distress

version_statement.version_notes: Short version with 7 items per subscale

title_statement.title: Depression, Anxiety and Stress Scale-21 (DASS-21) - Psychological Distress

study_info.abstract: The DASS-21 is a 21-item self-report questionnaire with three subscales: Depression (7 items), Anxiety (7 items), and Stress (7 items). Each item is rated on a 4-point scale indicating the degree to which the statement applied over the past week. The instrument has been widely used in clinical and research settings across many countries.

instrument_details.validity: Good discriminant validity between depression, anxiety, and stress

Applied to me to some degree
